meaningMnemonic: You have <radical>thread</radical> and some <radical>syrup</radical> and you need to <kanji>spin</kanji> them together. Drip the syrup onto the thread and spin it around and around over your head.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>spin</kanji> the syrup, it begins to change shape and forms into a <reading>coo</reading>kie (く)! Haven't you ever made syrup-spun cookies before? The spinning forms and cooks them in the air.
